00028         void SketchElementParser::parseAttributes(SketchElement *sketchElement,
00029                 TiXmlElement *xmlElement) const
00030         {
00031             if(xmlElement->Attribute("transform"))
00032                 parseTransform(sketchElement,
00033                         xmlElement->Attribute("transform"));
00034 
00035             if(xmlElement->Attribute("id"))
00036                 sketchElement->setId(xmlElement->Attribute("id"));
00037         }
00038 
00039         void SketchElementParser::parseTransform(SketchElement *sketchElement,
00040                 const std::string &data) const
00041         {
00042             TransformParser *tranformParser = new TransformParser();
00043             AffineTransformationMatrix matrix = tranformParser->parse(data);
00044             sketchElement->setMatrix(matrix);
00045             delete tranformParser;
00046         }
00047     }
00048 }
